financial.formula_text:
DSCR financial model = EBITDA (latest audit report or latest management account)/Total existing financing + proposed financing

note: if latest management account, need to submit the audited report for C.P

non_financial.formula_text: 1.DSCR non financial model = Total annualized Turnover X Income Factor/Total existing financing + proposed financing

RHB (SME).eligibility_notes:
1.DSCR non financial model = Total annualized Turnover X Income Factor/Total existing financing repayment + proposed financing repayment

2.DSCR financial model = EBITDA (latest audit report/management account) / total existing financing repayment + proposed financing repayment
(can use management account to calculate, subject to audited report to be furnished as per CP, with variance not more than 10-15%)

based on scoring, minimum 1x to 1.25x for target sector, minimum 1.25x to 1.5x for high risk sector

financial.formula_text:
DSCR financial model = EBITDA (latest audit report) / total existing financing repayment + proposed financing repayment

minimum 1x

non_financial.formula_text:
DSCR non financial model = Total annualized Turnover X Income Factor/Total existing financing repayment + proposed financing repayment (Note: not applicable if the annualized credit turnover is 20% higher VS sales in the latest audit report)

minimum 1x

Maybank.eligibility_notes:
1.DSCR non financial model = Total annualized Turnover X Income Factor/Total existing financing repayment + proposed financing repayment (Note: not applicable when the annualized turnover bank statement is more than 20% VS sales in the audited report)

2.DSCR financial model = EBITDA (latest audit report) /( total existing financing repayment  + proposed financing repayment)

minimum 1x

financial.formula_text: DSCR financial model = EBITDA (to exclude "Other Income") / total existing financing + proposed financing

non_financial.formula_text:
1. DSCR non financial model = total annualized turnover X income factor / total financing + proposed financing

2. DSCR (bank statement ending balance), applicable to loan amount below 3mil, subject to DSCR based on EBITDA is minimum 0.5x
DSCR = Average ending balance / total monthly commmitment (existing + proposed), must be at least 3x

CIMB Bank.eligibility_notes:
3. DSCR (bank statement ending balance), applicable to loan amount below 3mil, subject to DSCR based on EBITDA is minimum 0.5x
DSCR = Average ending balance / total monthly commmitment (existing + proposed), must be at least 3x

For CGC products, minimum 1x
For SJPP products, minimum 1.5x on non financial model, minimum 1x on financial model

non_financial.formula_text:
1. DSCR non financial model = (total financing + proposed financing / total annualized turnover X income factor) X 100%

2. DSCR based on bank statement ending balance (LCR), by using average ending balance on 5th, 15th, 25th and last day of the month

Standard Chartered.eligibility_notes:
L1 approval, must be 70% and below
L2 approval, must be within 70 - 79%

equivalent  1.25x to 1.43x for other banks

financial.formula_text:
Cash Surplus from Net Operating Cash Flow (Cash Flow Projection)/ Borrowings Commitment

Minimum 1.25x

SME Bank.projected_requirement_notes: must be above 1.25x except for contract financing

financial.formula_text: EBITDA margin % Projection X projection of sales / Bank Borrowings@commtiments

Bank Rakyat.projected_requirement_notes: must be above 1.25x except for contract financing
